hadiths.text: Abdul-Hamid bin Mahmud said:"We prayed behind one of the Amirs, the people compelled us such that we prayed between two columns. When we had prayed, Anas bin Malik said: 'We would be prevented from this during the time of Allah's Messenger

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الصَّفِّ بَيْنَ السَّوَارِي
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Dislike For Forming Rows Between Columns
